onboarding_one_text: Welcome to our app! Prepare to simplify your life with our user-friendly features. Whether it"s organizing events or managing your schedule, we"re here to help you make the most of every moment.
onboarding_two_text: Never forget a thing with our calendar reminder feature! Simply set reminders for important events, appointments, or deadlines. Stay organized effortlessly and make the most out of your day.
onboarding_three_text: Tailor your experience to suit your needs. Customize settings, personalize your calendar, and make this app truly yours. Enjoy a seamless journey as you navigate through your tasks and events effortlessly.
